Name: LU 727 - Zoning, 9114 5th Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 190447 ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 190447 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 727).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fnil\fprq2\fcharset0 Courier;}{\f2\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Calibri;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, Bayride Realty, LLC, \expndtw-6 filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 22b, changing from an existing C8-2 District to an R7A District and establishing within a proposed R7A District a C2-4 District ,  which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the construction of a new nine-story, approximately 45,000-square-foot mixed-use building with approximately 41 dwelling units and ground floor commercial uses at 9114 Fifth Avenue (Block 6087, Lots 23 and 31) in the Bay Ridge neighborhood of Brooklyn, Community District 10 (ULURP No. C 190447 ZMK) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on February 8, 2021, its decision dated February 3, 2021 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 190448 ZRK (Pre. L.U. No. 728), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720\f0 WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on February 9, 2021;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued August 31\super st\nosupersub , 2020 (CEQR No. 19DCP128K) which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality, and noise (E-513) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:  \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-513) and Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 190447 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission with the following modifications:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar Matter \ul underlined\ulnone  is new, to be added;\par
Matter \strike struck out\strike0  is to be deleted;\par
Matter double struck out is old, deleted by the City Council\par
Matter \uldb double-underlined\ulnone  is new, added by the City Council\fs32\par
\fs24 Matter within # # is defined in Section 12-10;\par
*     *     * indicates where unchanged text appears in the Zoning Resolution.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri144\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 22d: \par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\cbpat3\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\cf1\uldb 1.\ulnone\f1  \f0       \uldb changing from an existing C8-2 District to an R6A District property bounded by a line 75 feet northeasterly of 92\super nd\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Street, a line 125 feet northwesterly of 5\super th\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Avenue, 92\super nd\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Street, and a line 185 feet northwesterly of 5\super th\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Avenue\cf2 ;\ulnone\f1  \par
\pard\cbpat3\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\cf1  \cf2\par
\pard\cbpat3\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\cf1  \cf2\par
\cf1\strike\f0 1\strike0 2.\f1  \f0     changing from an existing C8-2 District to an R7A District property bounded by a line 85 feet southwesterly of 91\super st\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Street, 5th Avenue, 92\super nd\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Street,\f1  \f0 a line 185 feet northwesterly of 5\super th\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Avenue, a line 75 feet northeasterly of 92\super nd\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Street, and a line 125 feet northwesterly of 5\super th\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Avenue;\strike\f1  \f0 and\strike0\f1  \cf2\f0\par
\pard\cbpat3\ltrpar\qj\cf1\f1  \cf2\par
\pard\cbpat3\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\cf1\uldb\f0 3.\ulnone\f1          \uldb\f0 establishing within a proposed R6A District a C2-4 District bounded by a line 75 feet northeasterly of 92\super nd\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Street, a line 125 feet northwesterly of 5\super th\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Avenue, 92\super nd\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Street, and a line 185 feet northwesterly of 5\super th\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Avenue\cf2 ; and\ulnone\f1  \par
\pard\cbpat3\ltrpar\qj\cf1  \cf2\par
\cf1   \cf2\par
\pard\cbpat3\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\cf1\f0 2\uldb\strike 4\ulnone\strike0\f1 .      \f0 establishing within a proposed R7A District a C2-4 District bounded by a line 85 feet southwesterly of 91\super st\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Street, 5\super th\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Avenue, 92\super nd\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Street,\f1  \f0 a line 185 feet northwesterly of 5\super th\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Avenue, a line 75 feet northeasterly of 92\super nd\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Street,\f1  \f0 and a line 125 feet northwesterly of 5\super th\nosupersub\f1  \f0 Avenue;\f1  \cf2\f0\par
\pard\ltrpar\sa160\sl252\slmult1\cf0\f2\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f0\fs24 as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated September 14, 2020, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-577.\par
\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\f0 Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
